just a reminder, if you're using zonealarm:
go to:
'Program Control'
'Main'
set 'SmartDefense Advisor' to Manual
(this makes every program ask you for permission to use the net. don't worry, you can make any choices permanent so you don't keep getting bugged every 5 minutes)
***********BUT***********
if you're using any ms s/w, such as this,
you'll want to go to
'Advanced'
in
'SmartDefense Advisor'
and uncheck the
'Allow certified MS programs to run automatically'
otherwise there's really no point to using torrents cuz something'll phone home and then you'll be F*@ked!
